about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all Autumn 2021 Shop decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
- Autumn Wreath
- Autumn Leaf Open
- Pumpkin String Lights
- Table Dried Wheat
- Cozy Table Set
- Autumn Cornucopia
- Ancient Plant Pot
- Dry Flower Tip Jar
- Cozy Autumn Wall
- Victorian Grey
- Autumn Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
